title: Terrifying Evolution Of The Goblin King (Part 1)
body:
Terrifying Evolution Of The Goblin King (Part 1)

After a few hours of flight, the plane landed safely at the central city airport.

When the plane landed, Evan was already awake. Before leaving the plane, he used telepathy skill and asked Sebastian and Nathan not to tell anyone about the large number of his shadow undeads.

Although Sera knew about Elysia and some of his shadow undeads, she was still unaware of the total number of his shadow undeads.

Other than Nathan and Sebastian, no one knows that he has hundreds of shadow undeads who are all at the peak of A rank or A+ rank.

Sebastian and Nathan easily accepted his request and assured him they wouldn't tell anyone about his shadow undeads or skills.

When they left the plane, some people were already waiting for them at the airport. They were stationed there to receive normal people found in the Dark Guild's base.
